long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en_GB,es,es_419,:
If you are a crazy fan of endless runner games, you can't ignore Subway Surfers, which is also the type of game that runs non-stop on dangerous roads like other endless runner games.

Subway Surfer Online, also known as the "non-stop running" game, is loved by many of you on Fun Game. When participating in Subway Surfers Online, players will play the role of naughty teenagers who are being chased for painting graffiti on the train, running around the tracks to escape the inspector and his dog. When running, you must skillfully overcome obstacles and collect coins scattered on the tracks. The game only ends when you stumble, get caught by the inspector or hit the obstacles.

Instructions
On the computer, use the arrow keys

If you want play more game, press "Unblocked Games, Web Version" Button to find more games on our website:  https://monkeymart.org
